entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
